title: If Local News Wasn’t Trash, American Foods Outlawed In Other Countries 2.2.22
itunes:title: If Local News Wasn’t Trash, American Foods Outlawed In Other Countries 2.2.22
description:
In episode 1076, Jack and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by comedian Brian Simpson to discuss What If The Local News Covered Wage Theft, People Have Lost Faith in the Domino’s Tracker, Iceland Has An Eerily Well Preserved Big Mac On Display as a Historical Artifact and more!

  1. What If The Local News Covered Wage Theft
  2. In a Single Year, $1.78 Trillion Was Taken From the Working Class
  3. Tax Cheats Are Costing the U.S. $1 Trillion a Year, IRS Estimates
  4. People Have Lost Faith in the Domino’s Tracker
  5. Lawsuit accuses Domino's Pizza of 'rampant wage violations'
  6. Delivery driver wants Domino's to pay up after years of making less than minimum wage
  7. Domino's offers new 'tip' for customers who skip delivery amid driver shortage
  8. TikToker explains how the Domino’s Pizza tracker works in viral video
  9. Iceland Has An Eerily Well Preserved Big Mac On Display as a Historical Artifact
  10. Common US foods that are banned in other countries


Watch: Watermelon Prank Video

Follow: @jacquisneal @bscomedian

LISTEN: Web by The Roots

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
